features: PERFECT CHIN SUPPORT TRAVEL NECK PILLOW - This airplane pillow can better wrap your neck and free your chin, prevents the head from falling forward, relieves neck pain during travel.
BEST NECK PILLOW FOR TRAVELING - Unlike other travel pillows, This flight pillow can provide perfect support to protect the neck when you are sitting in the airplane, car, train, or bus.
PREMIUM MEMORY FOAM - napfun ERGONOMOR travel pillow was made of high quality memory foam with 5 seconds return technology, comfort and durable.
REAL PORTABLE PLANE PILLOW - The headrest pillow was designed for portability and comfort. It comes with a portable travel bag that allows the travel pillow to compress down to a smaller size.
LIFETIME REPLACEMENT GUARANTEE - If you have any problems, we promise to offer you a prompt and full refund!

How should I use the pillow properly after receiving it for the first time? The product is sealed in a travel bag, so it can not be ventilated in transit; consumers who are particularly sensitive to the smell are advised to put the pillow in the vent for 24-72 hours before use. What are the dimension differences between the Small and Medium versions? Our NAPFUN Pillow comes in one small size and is recommended for a Weight of 90-140 LB. Our NAPFUN Pillow Medium size is designed for a Weight of 120-200LB. NAPFUN Pillow SMALL: 9.65 x 9.65 x 4.33 inches NAPFUN Pillow MEDIUM: 10 x 10 x 4 inches When I receive travel pillow set, what parts are in the package? Series 3 Simple Sets(1 x premium high-elasticity memory foam travel pillow, Pillow in the Travel Bag ) Series 3 Luxury Sets (1 x premium high-elasticity memory foam travel pillow, 1 x Stripe Sleep Mask, 1 x pair of earplugs; All in the Travel Bag) What should I do if I have some questions or problems with the product after purchase or want to consult? If you have any questions about the product or need after-sales service, please cont act us via email from the NAPFUN after-sales team and we'll provide a re fund or exchange! What should I do if I don't like the travel pillow after I buy it? Try out our Travel pillow for 60 Days(from Order Time), and if during that time you don't love it, we will give you a full r efund with no questions asked.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Somewhat average overall
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the napfun Neck Pillow for Traveling, and while it serves its basic purpose adequately, I found it to be somewhat average overall.On the positive side, the pillow is reasonably comfortable and provides decent support for the neck during travel. The memory foam material is soft yet supportive, and it does help alleviate some discomfort during long journeys.However, there are a few drawbacks that prevent me from giving it a higher rating. Firstly, I found the pillow to be a bit bulky, which made it somewhat cumbersome to carry around, especially when traveling with limited luggage space.Additionally, I wasn't entirely satisfied with the overall design of the pillow. While it does offer some support, I found that it didn't contour to my neck as well as I had hoped, which resulted in some discomfort during prolonged use.Overall, the napfun Neck Pillow for Traveling is a decent option for those looking for a basic travel pillow. It provides some comfort and support, but it falls short in terms of portability and ergonomic design. While it may suffice for short trips or occasional use, there are likely better options available for those seeking a more comfortable and practical travel pillow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Travel Neck Pillow - Comfortable, Supportive, and Perfect for Air Travel!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the Neck Pillow for Traveling seven months ago, and I must say it has been an absolute game-changer for my air travel experiences. This upgraded travel neck pillow, made with 100% pure memory foam, has provided unparalleled comfort and support during long flights. Allow me to share my experience with this fantastic product.First and foremost, the comfort level of this travel neck pillow is exceptional. The 100% pure memory foam molds perfectly to the contours of my neck and head, providing customized support and alleviating any strain or discomfort. The plush and soft fabric cover adds an extra layer of coziness, making it incredibly comfortable to rest my head on during flights. It's like having a cloud for a pillow!The design of this neck pillow is specifically tailored for air travel. It features an ergonomic shape that cradles the neck and provides optimal support, allowing for a more relaxed and restful sleep. The adjustable toggle strap secures the pillow in place, preventing any slippage or shifting during the flight. This stability ensures that my head remains in a comfortable position, even if I doze off.The portability of this travel neck pillow is a significant advantage. It is lightweight and compact, making it easy to carry in my carry-on or attach to my luggage. The pillow comes with a convenient travel bag that keeps it clean and protected when not in use. This portability allows me to take the pillow with me on any trip, ensuring comfort and support wherever I go.Furthermore, the durability of this neck pillow is impressive. Despite using it regularly for the past seven months, the memory foam has retained its shape and firmness. The fabric cover has held up well, showing minimal signs of wear. The quality construction of this pillow ensures its longevity, making it a worthwhile investment.Cleaning this travel neck pillow is a breeze. The removable cover is machine washable, allowing for easy maintenance and hygiene. I appreciate the convenience of being able to keep the pillow clean and fresh, especially during extended travels.Lastly, I must mention the excellent customer service provided by the seller. They were responsive, professional, and ensured that my order arrived in perfect condition. Their commitment to customer satisfaction is evident, and it further reinforces my confidence in their brand.In conclusion, the Neck Pillow for Traveling has been an incredible addition to my travel essentials. Its comfort, support, portability, durability, and convenient design make it the perfect companion for air travel. I highly recommend this travel neck pillow to anyone looking for a comfortable and supportive solution to enhance their sleep during flights. Choose this neck pillow and experience a new level of comfort and relaxation during your travels!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The napfun neck pillow is a definite upgrade from other travel neck pillows I've used in the past. Its 100% pure memory foam construction provides a comfortable and supportive experience, making long flights much more bearable.One of the standout features of this pillow is its ergonomic design. It perfectly contours to the shape of my neck and head, offering excellent support and relieving any tension or discomfort during travel. I appreciate that it doesn't feel overly bulky, yet it still provides the necessary cushioning for a restful sleep.The light grey color and overall appearance of the pillow are quite stylish and appealing. It's compact and lightweight, making it easy to carry around without adding much weight to my carry-on luggage.The velvety soft cover adds a touch of luxury and is easily removable for cleaning. I've found it to be machine-washable, which is a significant plus for maintaining hygiene during travel.Furthermore, the portability of this pillow is top-notch. It comes with a travel bag that allows me to compress and store it efficiently when not in use. This feature is particularly useful when I want to save space in my backpack or suitcase.However, while the pillow is comfortable overall, I would have appreciated a bit more firmness in the memory foam. Sometimes, during extended use, it tends to flatten out a little, and I have to adjust it to regain its original shape and support.Another minor drawback is that the strap that attaches the pillow to my carry-on luggage could be more durable. It seems a bit flimsy, and I'm unsure how well it will hold up after prolonged use.In terms of functionality, this neck pillow does a great job of providing support for my headrest sleep during flights. It keeps my neck in a comfortable position and helps prevent any unwanted strain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for those with shorter necks
reviews.reviewText: I used this on a recent trip to Asia and easily slept the most I have ever slept on a plane. I was in the middle seat and I always have the issue of head bobbing when I sleep. This pillow provided the perfect amount of support and the tie prevented my head from falling forward as well. However, my boyfriend tried it and he has a longer neck, and it doesn't work for him. The pillow has to hit at your ears to really work and he had too much of a gap. The memory foam is soft but sturdy and can easily be rolled into the bag and return to shape.
Returned because it didn't support the neck much. Maybe the foam is too soft, but there is no support on the side of the neck when falling asleep.
